headline: Why Is Larry Robbins Bullish on Global Payments Inc. (GPN) Now?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Billionaire Larry Robbins’ Long-Term Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Global Payments Inc. (NYSE:GPN) stands against Larry Robbins’ other long-term stock picks. Larry Robbins is an American hedge fund manager, philanthropist, and the founder, CEO, and portfolio manager of Glenview Capital, […]
